name: Techniques Table 550E
descr:
The Techniques Multi-Therapist Table is designed for today’s multidisciplinary practices or rehabilitation practice – as an examination, treatment table or examination chair. This "hybrid” table is a chiropractic, massage, physiotherapy, acupuncture and naturopath table combined into one. Ideal for clinics where multi practitioners share a room and treatment table.

Standard Features

    24" wide treatment surface
    Lumbar and thoracic elevating section
    Choice of stationary table height (20" up to 32")
    Multidirectional head piece (elevation and tilt)
    Levelling floor glides
    Sturdy steel construction
    Wide assortment of colours in health care grade upholstery
    Easy Drop cocking foot pedals located on both sides of the table (when drop section is added)
    Table is fully upgradable at any time, upgrades simply bolt on

Options

    TT-300 Cervical drop section (chiropractic style head rest only)
    TT-301 Thoracic drop section
    TT-303 Lumbar drop sections
    TT-400 Manual Pump Elevation 23-30" Standard (19-26" Optional)
    TT-410 Electric Elevations with 2 pedals included 23-30" Standard (19-26" Optional)
    TT-451 Side extensions (2 cushions, turn into chair arms when back rest is in up position)
    TT-455 Massage Therapy Head Rest – Slip-on and adjustable.
    TT-552 Seat elevating (back rest) allows the therapist to use the table as both an examination table and chair.
    Your choice of physiotherapy style headrest or massage headrest.
    Table can be custom made for specific needs
